name: altamedia-web-app
description: AltaMedia Web Application with React Frontend and Express Backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --production=false && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: AltaMedia Team
